name: Tartaros Risen
description:
Tartaros Risen is a Rogue-like Auto-battler. Players build armies using units, items, and augments and choose paths to explore in a dungeon. Try to survive as long as you can!

This game is under development. Currently, only 38 out of 100 units have been implemented. Items and augments will be added at a later date. There are 40 rounds of gameplay! Can you beat them all without losing?

Twitter: https://twitter.com/TartarosRisen

Game Control information:
Click the gear at the top right to find a volume slider and a quit button.
Click quit to return to title screen, to reset the game.
Click the Damage button to the right for damage charts. Click again to show enemy damage, and again to turn it off.
Click "Ally Army" at the top left to toggle the traits to show enemy traits.
Right click any unit to view its stats.
While viewing a unit's stats, click "Buy EXP" to buy 1 experience for the unit (cost 1 gold). When a unit's experience bar fills up, it levels up.
Drag and drop your units with the left mouse button to reposition your army.

Please leave a comment if you enjoyed the game or found a bug!
Thank you for checking out Tartaros Risen!
